title: Lightening
description:
Lightening


it's like living in a movie scene

christ, anti christ and the space in-between

A trinity a symphony a resonance never heard or seen

But felt when at the last second the divine intervenes

What even is a miracle?

They say in the last days we’ll see signs in the heavens 

The moon will turn blood red and there will be blood shed

Devastations and plagues and things not to come yet

So grab the ones you love and ask for mercy not justice

If you wanna know if ive lost hope

Ive lost moments many long ago

The only thing that i know is that if the seed goes in the soil

And he toils and he fights and he dies he will behold him self grow

So thats why i go this path ive chose

Cuz I saw Satan fall like lightening

lightening

a hijinks hijacked by dionysis

everything is not exactly how it might seem

Inject these words like an IV

right into your phsyche

Welcome to the garden so inviting

The walls are full of ivy

the tree in the center its looking so enticing

Devil wants to shut me up but if he doesn't like me

he's gonna have to bow

to the son on the horizon

my eyes have been opened

the devil revealed

I'm not afraid to tell the secrets

 let the people heal

we are fallen we will rise

in the morning as the tide

as he was stricken and was victim

so must now I

But why on earth would i be afraid to die

The serpent crawls on his belly i stand head held high

Not a man can touch me at least not until its time

So as the abyss stares into me i dont blink an eye

it's hard to climb this mountain with this cross on my back

I walk with God I know he sees me in this constant attack

They want me to feel bad, i do not in fact

No im sorry i will not now or ever apologize for that

life is supposed to be

a simple thing

it's a mystery

devils cry is defening

meanwhile the angels whispering

don't get too attached to this planet

your stranded right now but theres a mode of being and a method to the madness

One you catch it

You’ll be laughing

Is it that easy actually

 Can it be the masterpiece

Starts right here where im standing


Its like playing guitar hero

Im not hitting every button right but one thing is clear though

The music leads me right where i fear to go

And the moment i enter in is when i see miracles


So as lightening flashes from the east to the west and the son of man is

Put on display for the masses and they scoff at him and mock him there is only one answer

Father the time has come, into your hands we

Trust and abide and await your commandment
